official_title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to provide medicare and medicaid coverage of personal emergency response services, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends titles XVIII (Medicare) and XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide for the coverage of personal emergency response services. Defines such services as the provision and maintenance of communication equipment in an individual's home which signals a personal emergency monitoring agency.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to provide medicare and medicaid coverage of personal emergency response services, and for other purposes.
